    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Carburants Brûlants</string>
            <string language="en">Burning Fuels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brennende Kraftstoffe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Combustíveis Ardentes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Combustibili Burning</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καίγοντας καύσιμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Combustibles Ardientes</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Utilisation des carburants de carbone :  Carburants brûlants. Animation  interactive montrant comment la disponibilité de l'oxygène affecte l'énergie libérée par la brûlure de combustible.</string>
            <string language="en">Using carbon fuels: Burning fuels. Interactive animation showing how oxygen availability affects the energy released by burning fuels.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">ressources énergétiques</string>
            <string language="en">energy resources</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">combustibles fossiles</string>
            <string language="en">fossil fuels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">brûlure</string>
            <string language="en">burning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">hydrocarbures</string>
            <string language="en">hydrocarbons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">charbon</string>
            <string language="en">coal</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verwenden der Carbonkraftstoffe: Brennende 
Kraftstoffe. Interaktive Animationvertretung, wie 
Sauerstoffverwendbarkeit die Energie beeinflußt, die durch das 
Brennen freigegeben wird, tankt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando combustíveis do carbono: 
Combustíveis ardentes. A exibição interativa do 
animation como a disponibilidade do oxigênio afeta a energia liberada
queimando abastece-se.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando i combustibili del carbonio: 
Combustibili burning. La rappresentazione interattiva di 
animazione come la disponibilità dell'ossigeno interessa l'energia 
liberata bruciandosi si rifornisce.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποίηση των καυσίμων άνθρακα: Κάψιμο των 
καυσίμων. Διαλογική ζωτικότητα που επιδεικνύει πώς η 
διαθεσιμότητα οξυγόνου έχει επιπτώσεις στην ενέργεια που 
εκδίδεται με το κάψιμο των καυσίμων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usar los combustibles del carbón: 
Combustibles ardientes. La demostración interactiva de la
animación cómo la disponibilidad del oxígeno afecta la energía 
release/versión quemándose aprovisionó de combustible.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energiebetriebsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fossilbrennstoffe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brennen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kohlenwasserstoffe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kohle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">recursos de energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">combustíveis fossil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">queimadura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">hidrocarbonetos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
